content.rendered:
Content Creation

High quality content for all

Differentiate your content production platform, editing tool, or marketplace by offering high-quality audio and video capabilities to your customers.

START BUILDING FOR FREE
Contact sales

Trusted by our customers

Offer high-fidelity audio and video processing

Whether you’re an online video editing platform, content marketplace, or creative content studio, you understand that when it comes to audio and video content, quality matters.

Help your customers achieve professional results and offer a differentiated service with Dolby.io’s comprehensive suite of APIs.

Integrate the Enhance API into your platform and workflow to offer one-click media enhancement of recorded media files to your customers. Offer customers more insights into their media files with the Analyze API. Or create interactive audio and video solutions with the Communications APIs. Stand out from the competition and introduce a new source of revenue.

Our Customers

Box and Dolby transform media in the cloud

New integration provides Box users worldwide access to automated audio enhancement tools powered by industry-defining Dolby technology.
Read More

Spoken Layer speaks on short-form audio

“We believe that short-form audio is more distributable, more reusable, more engaging, and can keep the attention of a user, because they can get an entire package in a two-to three-to four-minute experience, as opposed to 20, 60, or 90 minutes.”
Read More

How VEED enabled one-click audio enhancement in 20 minutes with Dolby.io

As simple as it is to use, VEED is an incredibly powerful online video editor loaded with features users love, like audio enhancement by Dolby.io.
Read More

Popular use cases

Recorded content distribution

Audio and video content broadcasting

Audio issue identification

Content capture for post-processing

Creator content and enhancement tools

Content segmentation and analysis

Thanks to Dolby.io, we can take a diverse set of content, stories, and audio and elevate clarity and quality to create a consistent audience experience for our customers.

Will Mayo

Founder & Chief Strategy Officer, SpokenLayer

Having really powerful audio cleaning, equalization and audio enhancement technology is something no one else in the industry is offering, which has really set us apart from the pack.

Sabba Keynejad

Co-founder and CEO, VEED.io

Dolby lets us innovate on our product without having to be audiovisual experts so we can focus on what matters -delivering immediate value to our customers.

Sabba Keynejad

Co-founder and CEO, VEED.io

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

The Dolby difference

Dolby has revolutionized the science of sight and sound through innovative research and engineering. Right out-of-the box, your users can experience Dolby-quality sound in your apps through the power of Dolby Voice®. Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology backed by decades of expertise in sound signal processing.

Reliable and scalable

Our network resilience and random loss distribution capabilities help to maintain audio quality between users even in the most challenging network conditions. Our mixing solution processes over 15 billion minutes annually with conference providers such as BlueJeans and British Telecom.

Secure and compliant

From encryption and security certification to our commitment to a secure environment, Dolby.io delivers a communication service that you can trust. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Resources

Explore additional content

Developer

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Create Audio Podcasts from Video By Using a Transcode API in Post-Production

Learn to produce audio-only mp3s from recorded mp4 videos as a podcasting tool use case.

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Dolby.io Streaming API with Millicast at SXSW 2022

Dolby.io showed off our new Streaming API at South by Southwest 2022 using our acquisition of Millicast. …

Griffin Solot-Kehl

Developer Advocate

Communications

Using Kotlin to Create Your First Audio Voice Call on Android with Dolby.io

Learn how to use Kotlin to build an Android application that supports Voice Calls.

Denize Ignacio

Developer Relations

Developer

Using Music Mastering on “Take Me Out to the Ball Game”

In this guide we explore how to algorithmically remaster the 1908 baseball anthem “Take Me Out to …

Braden Riggs

Developer Advocate

Get started

Achieve professional-sounding results

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
